name: adc_gtm_datacenter_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()


def getGTMDataCenterList():
    '''
    to get the list of GTM Data Centers

    '''

    datacenter_list = []
    adc_datacenter_list = connect_db.appviewx.gdc.find()
    for device in adc_datacenter_list:
        datacenter_list.append(device)
    return datacenter_list
description: To get a list of GTM datacenter
_keywords: To get a list of GTM datacenter
